author: newsr.in
title: Microsoft Admits It Accidentally Forced the Windows 10 Upgrade on Windows 7 PCs - newsR
text: As we reported to you yesterday, a number of users that were still running Windows 7 on their PCs had been forced to upgrade to Windows 10, with Windows Update providing no other option than to restart the computer and start the install. Although at first it wasn’t very clear what exactly happened because the Windows 10 upgrade w... »
